hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Water Temple Boss Key# can be found at #Gerudo's Fortress#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Boomerang Room Small Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: Where did Anju meet her lover?^${12 39 C7}At a Kafei.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Bomb Bag#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #1# major item.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Bomb Bag#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Goron Shop#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Zelda's Lullaby#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: Did you know that you only need to play the Song of Time to open the Door of Time? The Spiritual Stones are not needed.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path to #the Tower#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that within the #valley#, the crate and waterfall conceal...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Map of Jabu Jabu's Belly#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Slingshot Room Side Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #diving experiment# is rewarded with #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: It would be a shame if something... unfortunate... were to happen to you.^Have you considered saving lately?

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #the Song of Storms#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##the Market## has #1# major item.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Zelda's Lullaby#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers #Talon's House#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Deku Shield#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well MQ Compass Chest
Bottom of the Well MQ Dead Hand Freestanding Key

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Happy Mask Shop#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Game Key#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Hover Boots Chest

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.
